description: Erection of two side dormers, raising a chimney and installation of 2no front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: By virtue of its design, position and height, the proposed box style side dormer extensions would appear as  bulky and incongruous additions that would fail to respect the characteristics of the host dwelling and surrounding area. The proposal would therefore be contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2019), Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted Core Strategy (2012) and Policy Guidance 39 of the Council's Residential Design Supplementary Planning Document (2013).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details for Conditions 4 (Detailed Drainage Design) and  7 (Contamination) of planning permission 20/03293/FUL have been assessed by relevant consultants and are hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the approved details.
